tool_description: Analyzes competitive landscape and benchmarks product performance against market competitors using pricing, features, and market positioning data.

product_ids.description: Your products to analyze against competitors

analysis_dimensions.description: Aspects to analyze: price, features, reviews, market_share, availability

error_messages: Invalid analysis dimensions: Use combinations of [price, features, reviews, market_share, availability].
Competitor data not found: One or more competitor products could not be identified.
Insufficient competitive data: Not enough competitor data available for meaningful analysis.
Product matching failed: Unable to match your products with competitor equivalents.
usage: Specify your product_ids and competitor_products, optionally choose analysis_dimensions and market_segment. Returns competitive positioning and benchmark analysis.

competitive_positioning.description: Positioning analysis for each product vs competitors
